Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

A string that provides the text for the first prompt. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Calendar".

Docs.summary: A string that provides the text that prompts the user to select a date. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Choose a date".

Docs.summary: A string that provides the text that prompts the user to select a month. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Choose a month".

Docs.summary: A string that provides the text that prompts the user to select a week. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Choose a week".

Docs.summary: A string that provides the text that prompts the user to select an era. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Select an era:".

Docs.summary: A string that provides the text that prompts the user to select an option. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Select an option:".

Docs.summary: A string that provides the text that prompts the user to enter a date. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Type a date".

Docs.summary: A string to use as an error message if the date entered was incorrect. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "The date entered was incorrect".

Docs.summary: A string to use as an error message if the expected decimal code is not present. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Decimal code is expected after the group picture character".

Docs.summary: A string that provides the text for the redirect link label. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Continue".

Docs.summary: A string containing the message to display preceding a link that redirects the browser to another page. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is " Click the following link to continue".

Docs.summary: A string to use as an error message if an attempt is made to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.Page%2A> property of a object. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "The set method of Page property is not expected to be called directly. It should be overridden by subclasses".

Docs.summary: A string to use as an error message if multiple controls are set to appear across a object's secondary pages. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Multiple controls attempting secondary UI".

A string to use as an error message if an attempt to write a multipart document is made. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Target does not support multipart documents".

Docs.summary: A string to use as an error message if invalid data was posted for the current control's <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ViewMode%2A> property. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Invalid posted data for current ObjectList ViewMode. (The ObjectList may have been databound on postback during Page_Load, resetting the ViewMode. Call DataBind in Page_Load only if IsPostBack is false.)"

Docs.summary: A string that provides the text for the **Back** label. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Back".

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Go".

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "OK".

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Method:".

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Server Error in {0}".

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Stack Trace:".

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Style sheet id not present in query string".

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "Style sheet id not present in query string".

Docs.summary: A string to use to advise calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetCacheKey%2A> method before getting the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.CacheKey%2A> property. remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "You must call SetCacheKey before getting the CacheKey".

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this string is "You must call SetSessionKey before getting the SessionKey".
